Package szte.mi

Interface Player

All Known Implementing Classes:
CmdLinePlayer, GreedyLimitMoveAI, GUIPlayer, RandomAI
public interface Player
The interface the player has to implement.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    init (int order, long t, Random rnd)
    Performs initialization depending on the parameters.
    Move
    nextMove (Move prevMove, long tOpponent, long t)
    Calculates the next move of the player in a two player game.

  • Method Details

    • init

      void init (int order, long t, Random rnd)
      Performs initialization depending on the parameters.
      Parameters:
      order - Defines the order of the players. Value 0 means this is the first player to move, 1 means second and so on. For two-player games only values 0 and 1 are possible.
      t - Gives the remaining overall running time of the player in ms. Initialization is also counted as running time.
      rnd - source of randomness to be used wherever random numbers are needed

    • nextMove

      Move nextMove (Move prevMove, long tOpponent, long t)
      Calculates the next move of the player in a two player game. It is assumed that the player is stateful and the game is deterministic, so the parameters only give the previous move of the other player and remaining times.
      Parameters:
      prevMove - the previous move of the opponent. It can be null, which means the opponent has not moved (or this is the first move).
      tOpponent - remaining time of the opponent
      t - remaining time for this player
      Returns:
      the move selected by the player
